context: Global fashion retailer responding to consumer demand and regulatory pressure for supply chain transparency

request.purpose: Implement blockchain-based supply chain tracking system for cotton and synthetic fiber products
request.justification: Consumer surveys show 70% prioritize transparency, upcoming EU regulations require traceability, competitive advantage in sustainable fashion market

decision_process.outcome: Strong consumer demand identified, regulatory requirements confirmed for 2026
Blockchain solution provides 95% traceability accuracy, mobile app for consumer access
80% of key suppliers ready for implementation, training program developed
Projected 15% price premium on transparent products, 25% increase in sustainable customer segment
Approved for pilot with 20% of product lines, full rollout contingent on pilot success

business_impact.timeline: 12 months for pilot, 24 months for full implementation
